alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 24 at 12:07PM AKST until December 24 at 10:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. Blowing snow is still expected with visibilities as low as 3/4 mile. * WHERE...Thompson Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will continue to gust up to 45 mph through this evening causing very cold wind chills. Tonight winds will slightly decrease and temperatures will slowly rise which will improve wind chills.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
